name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Full Stack Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in designing and developing high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **C#/.NET**, **React**, SQL Server, and implementing unit testing and automated coverage to ensure quality and reliability within software products. Experienced in API design and development, and deploying cloud-hosted systems on **Azure**, aligning with agile principles and lean delivery methodologies. 

Skilled in creating innovative solutions leveraging **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for both frontend and backend development, utilizing **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept at building AI/ML-powered platforms with a focus on predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Extensive experience in implementing CI/CD pipelines, microservices, and event-driven architectures. Strong adherence to compliance-driven development standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, coupled with a solid MLOps background involving model training and orchestration with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Excellent communicator with a collaborative mindset, consistently driving team success.
